SEARCH
Package Server.IndexStorageBarrel.Operations

Class BarrelPopulate

java.lang.Object
Server.IndexStorageBarrel.Operations.BarrelPopulate
public class BarrelPopulate extends Object
This class represents the BarrelPopulate class, which is responsible for populating the database with data from SyncData and CrawlData objects. It provides methods to insert sync data into the database and handle the insertion of crawl data. The class uses a connection to the database and an instance of BarrelProcessing for processing the data.

    • stopTransaction

      private void stopTransaction()
      Stops the current transaction by rolling back any changes made and setting auto-commit to true. If an SQLException occurs during the rollback, it is logged as an error.

    • insertWebsites

      private boolean insertWebsites(List<Map<String,Object>> rows)
      Inserts a list of websites into the database.
      Parameters:
      rows - the list of websites to insert
      Returns:
      true if the websites were successfully inserted, false otherwise

    • insertKeywords

      private boolean insertKeywords(List<Map<String,Object>> rows)
      Inserts a list of keywords into the "keywords" table in the database.
      Parameters:
      rows - a list of maps containing the keyword, id, and searches values to be inserted
      Returns:
      true if the keywords were successfully inserted, false otherwise

    • insertUrls

      private boolean insertUrls(List<Map<String,Object>> rows)
      Inserts a list of URLs into the database.
      Parameters:
      rows - the list of rows containing the URLs and their corresponding IDs
      Returns:
      true if the URLs were successfully inserted, false otherwise

    • insertWebsiteKeywords

      private boolean insertWebsiteKeywords(List<Map<String,Object>> rows)
      Inserts website keywords into the database.
      Parameters:
      rows - a list of maps containing the website ID, keyword ID, and TF-IDF values
      Returns:
      true if the insertion is successful, false otherwise

    • insertWebsiteUrl

      private boolean insertWebsiteUrl(List<Map<String,Object>> rows)
      Inserts website URLs into the database.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the insertion is successful, false otherwise

    • insertCrawlData

      public void insertCrawlData(CrawlData crawlData) throws SQLException
      Inserts crawl data into the database.
      Parameters:
      crawlData - The crawl data to be inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while inserting the crawl data.

    • handleWebsiteInsertOrUpdate

      private QueryResult handleWebsiteInsertOrUpdate(String url, String title, String description)
      Handles the insertion or update of a website record in the database. If the URL already exists in the database, the existing record is updated with the provided title and description. If the URL does not exist, a new record is inserted with the provided URL, title, and description.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the website
      title - the title of the website
      description - the description of the website
      Returns:
      the ID of the inserted or updated website record

    • handleKeywordBatchInsertion

      private Map<String,Integer> handleKeywordBatchInsertion(List<String> tokens)
      Inserts a batch of keywords into the database and retrieves their corresponding IDs.
      Parameters:
      tokens - the list of keywords to be inserted
      Returns:
      a map containing the keywords as keys and their corresponding IDs as values

    • handleWebsiteKeywordBatchInsertion

      private void handleWebsiteKeywordBatchInsertion(QueryResult website, Map<String,Integer> keywordIdMap, List<String> tokens)
      Inserts a batch of website keywords into the database.
      Parameters:
      website - ID and new URL flag for the website.
      keywordIdMap - a map containing the keyword IDs
      tokens - a list of tokens to be inserted

    • handleUrlBatchInsertion

      private void handleUrlBatchInsertion(QueryResult website, List<URL> urls)
      Handles the batch insertion of URLs for a given website.
      Parameters:
      website - ID and new URL flag for the website.
      urls - The list of URLs to be inserted.

    • incrementSearches

      public void incrementSearches(String keyword)
      Increments the search count for a given keyword in the database. If the keyword already exists, the search count is incremented by 1. If the keyword does not exist, it is added to the database with a search count of 1.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to increment the search count for
